column2:
"...You're really familiar with techniques.
It looks like you're really stable
in both mind and body as a Force."

"...I think you should follow the flow
of your body and not think about it too
deeply."

"...it's up to you how you do that.
I'll also try to follow the flow of my
body with you."

"……フォトンが、とても馴染んでる。
フォースとして、心身ともに
とても安定しているようね。"

"……深く考えすぎないで
流れに身を任せていいと思う。"

"……やり方は自由。
私も一緒に、流れに身を任せてみる。"
